item.title: How to create a Hugo-based markdown blog
item.description: Step 1: The spark ignites Oooh, look at this cool person’s blog post that was posted on Hacker News… Why don’t I have cool, minimal blog like this? Step 2: Pick your theme Spend two hours browsing minimal Hugo themes until you find one that’s simple yet functional. Step 3: Simplify Why does this “simple” theme include google analytics, disqus, and javascript auto day/night theme detection? I should gut it of all the stuff I don’t need…
